trans-unit.target: ລົບລ້າງ
trans-unit.note: The button that clears history even when Sync is connected.

trans-unit.id: History will be removed from all your connected devices. This cannot be undone.
trans-unit.source: History will be removed from all your connected devices. This cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: ປະຫວັດການໃຊ້ງານຈະຖືກລຶບອອກຈາກອຸປະກອນທີ່ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ທັງຫມົດຂອງທ່ານ. ການກະທຳນີ້ຈະບໍ່ສາມາດຍົກເລີກໄດ້.
trans-unit.note: Description of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear history that's synced to another device.

trans-unit.id: Remove history from your Firefox Account?
trans-unit.source: Remove history from your Firefox Account?
trans-unit.target: ລືບປະຫວັດການໃຊ້ງານອອກຈາກບັນຊີ Firefox ຂອງທ່ານຫລືບໍ່?
trans-unit.note: Title of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear history that's synced to another device.

trans-unit.id: Are you sure you want to clear all of your data? This will also close all open tabs.
trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to clear all of your data? This will also close all open tabs.
trans-unit.target: ທ່ານຫມັ້ນໃຈແລ້ວບໍ່ວ່າທ່ານຕ້ອງການຈະເຄີຍຂໍ້ມູນທຸກຢ່າງຂອງທ່ານ? ເຊິງມັນຈະປິດທຸກແທັບທີ່ທ່ານເປີດຢູ່.
trans-unit.note: Message shown in the dialog prompting users if they want to clear everything

trans-unit.target: ປະຫວັດການທ່ອງເວັບ

trans-unit.id: A username and password are being requested by %@.
trans-unit.source: A username and password are being requested by %@.

trans-unit.id: Could not add page to Reading List. Maybe it's already there?
trans-unit.source: Could not add page to Reading List. Maybe it's already there?
trans-unit.target: ບໍ່ສາມາດເພີ່ມຫນ້າເວັບເຂົ້າໄປໃນລາຍການອ່ານ. ບາງເທື່ອມັນອາດຈະມີຫນ້າເວັບນີ້ຢູ່ແລ້ວ?
trans-unit.note: Accessibility message e.g. spoken by VoiceOver after the user wanted to add current page to the Reading List and this was not done, likely because it already was in the Reading List, but perhaps also because of real failures.

trans-unit.id: Could not add page to Reading list
trans-unit.source: Could not add page to Reading list
trans-unit.target: ບໍ່ສາມາດເພີ່ມຫນ້າເວັບເຂົ້າໄປໃນລາຍການອ່ານ
trans-unit.note: Accessibility message e.g. spoken by VoiceOver after adding current webpage to the Reading List failed.

trans-unit.target: ບໍ່ສາມາດໂຫລດຫນ້າເວັບນີ້ໄດ້.

trans-unit.note: Name for display settings button in reader mode. Display in the meaning of presentation, not monitor.

trans-unit.id: Do you want to save the password for %@ on %@?
trans-unit.source: Do you want to save the password for %1$@ on %2$@?
trans-unit.target: ທ່ານຕ້ອງການບັນທຶກລະຫັດຜ່ານສຳລັບ %1$@ ໄວ້ໃນ %2$@ ຫລືບໍ?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for saving a password. The first parameter is the username being saved. The second parameter is the hostname of the site.

trans-unit.id: Do you want to save the password on %@?
trans-unit.source: Do you want to save the password on %@?
trans-unit.target: ທ່ານຕ້ອງການບັນທຶກລະຫັດຜ່ານສຳລັບໄວ້ໃນ %@ ຫລືບໍ?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for saving a password with no username. The parameter is the hostname of the site.

trans-unit.id: Do you want to update the password for %@ on %@?
trans-unit.source: Do you want to update the password for %1$@ on %2$@?
trans-unit.target: ທ່ານຕ້ອງການອັບເດດລະຫັດຜ່ານສຳລັບ %1$@ ໃນ %2$@ ຫລືບໍ?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for updating a password. The first parameter is the username being saved. The second parameter is the hostname of the site.

trans-unit.id: Do you want to update the password on %@?
trans-unit.source: Do you want to update the password on %@?
trans-unit.target: ທ່ານຕ້ອງການອັບເດດລະຫັດຜ່ານສຳລັບໃນ %@ ຫລືບໍ?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for updating a password with on username. The parameter is the hostname of the site.

trans-unit.id: Firefox will stop syncing with your account, but won’t delete any of your browsing data on this device.
trans-unit.source: Firefox will stop syncing with your account, but won’t delete any of your browsing data on this device.
trans-unit.target: Firefox ຈະຢຸດການ Sync ກັບບັນຊີຂອງທ່ານ, ແຕວ່າຈະບໍ່ລຶບປະຫວັດການຄົ້ນຫາຂອງທ່ານໃນອຸປະກອນນີ້.

trans-unit.target: ນຳເອົາແທັບທີ່ທ່ານເປີດ, ບຸກມາກ ແລະ ລະຫັດຜ່ານຂອງທ່ານຈາກອຸປະກອນອື່ນເຂົ້າມາ.
trans-unit.note: A re-worded offer about Sync that emphasizes one-way data transfer, not syncing.

trans-unit.note: Syncing Firefox Account

Message spoken by VoiceOver saying the position of the single currently visible tab in Tabs Tray, along with the total number of tabs. E.g. \"Tab 2 of 5\" says that tab 2 is visible (and is the only visible tab), out of 5 tabs total.

Message spoken by VoiceOver saying the range of tabs that are currently visible in Tabs Tray, along with the total number of tabs. E.g. \"Tabs 8 to 10 of 15\" says tabs 8, 9 and 10 are visible, out of 15 tabs total.

trans-unit.target: ແທັບ Tray
trans-unit.note: Accessibility label for the Tabs Tray view.

trans-unit.target: ໂຄງການ Mozilla
trans-unit.note: Tile title for Mozilla

trans-unit.id: The page could not be displayed in Reader View.
trans-unit.source: The page could not be displayed in Reader View.
trans-unit.target: ຫນ້າເວັບນີ້ບໍ່ສາມາດສະແດງຢູ່ໃນ Reader View.
trans-unit.note: Message displayed when the reader mode page could not be loaded. This message will appear only when sharing to Firefox reader mode from another app.

trans-unit.id: There is a new version available of Firefox Aurora. Tap OK to go to the download page.
trans-unit.source: There is a new version available of Firefox Aurora. Tap OK to go to the download page.
trans-unit.target: Firefox Aurora ມີລຸ້ນໃຫມ່ອອກມາໃຫ້ດາວໂຫລດແລ້ວ. ແຕະປຸ່ມ "ຕົກລົງ" ເພື່ອໄປຫນ້າດາວໂຫລດ.
trans-unit.note: Prompt message for application update

trans-unit.id: There was a problem accessing tabs from your other devices. Try again in a few moments.
trans-unit.source: There was a problem accessing tabs from your other devices. Try again in a few moments.
trans-unit.target: ມີບັນຫາເຮັດໃຫ້ບໍ່ສາມາດເຂົ້າເຖິງແທັບຈາກອຸປະກອນອື່ນໆຂອງທ່ານ. ກະລຸນາລອງໃຫມ່ອີກຄັ້ງໃນອີກ 2-3 ນາທີຂ້າງຫນ້າ.
trans-unit.note: Error message in the remote tabs panel

trans-unit.id: There was an error converting the page

trans-unit.target: ເກີດມີຂໍ້ຜິດພາດໃນການ Convert ຫນ້າເວັບ
trans-unit.note: Error displayed when reader mode cannot be enabled

trans-unit.id: 1Password Extension was cancelled by the user

trans-unit.note: 1Password Extension Error Message

trans-unit.id: App Extension API is not available in this version of iOS
trans-unit.source: App Extension API is not available in this version of iOS
trans-unit.target: API ຂອງສ່ວນຂະຫຍາຍ App ບໍ່ສາມາດໃຊ້ງານໄດ້ໃນ iOS ລຸ້ນນີ້
trans-unit.note: 1Password Extension Error Message

trans-unit.note: 1Password Extension Error Message

trans-unit.id: Failed to execute script that collects web page information
trans-unit.source: Failed to execute script that collects web page information
trans-unit.target: ມີຂໍ້ຜິດພາດໃນການປະມວນຜົນສະຄຣິບທີ່ເຮັດຫນ້າທີເກັບຮວບຮວມຂໍ້ມູນຂອງຫນ້າເວັບ
trans-unit.note: 1Password Extension Error Message

trans-unit.id: Failed to fill web page because script could not be evaluated
trans-unit.source: Failed to fill web page because script could not be evaluated
trans-unit.target: ມີຂໍ້ຜິດພາດໃນການຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນໃສ່ຫນ້າເວັບເນື່ອງຈາກວ່າສະຄຣິບບໍ່ສາມາດປະມວນຜົນໄດ້
trans-unit.note: 1Password Extension Error Message

trans-unit.id: Failed to fill web page because script is missing
trans-unit.source: Failed to fill web page because script is missing
trans-unit.target: ມີຂໍ້ຜິດພາດໃນການຕື່ມຂໍ້ມູນໃສ່ຫນ້າເວັບເນື່ອງຈາກວ່າບໍ່ມີສະຄຣິບ
trans-unit.note: 1Password Extension Error Message

trans-unit.id: Failed to obtain URL String from web view. The web view must be loaded completely when calling the 1Password Extension
trans-unit.source: Failed to obtain URL String from web view. The web view must be loaded completely when calling the 1Password Extension
trans-unit.target: ມີຂໍ້ຜິດພາດໃນການຮັບ URL String ຈາກມຸມມອງເວັບ. ມຸມມອງເວັບຈະຕ້ອງຖືກໂຫລດມາໃຫ້ສຳເລັດເມື່ອຕ້ອງການເອີ້ນໃຊ້ສ່ວນຂະຍາຍ 1Password
trans-unit.note: 1Password Extension Error Message

trans-unit.id: Failed to parse information returned by 1Password Extension
trans-unit.source: Failed to parse information returned by 1Password Extension
trans-unit.target: ມີຂໍ້ຜິດພາດໃນການແຍກວິເຄາະຂໍ້ມູນທີ່ສົ່ງກັບມາໂດຍສ່ວນຂະຍາຍ 1Password
trans-unit.note: 1Password Extension Error Message

trans-unit.target: ສົ່ງຂໍ້ມູນການໃຊ້ງານແບບບໍ່ລະບຸຕົວຕົນ
trans-unit.note: See http://bit.ly/1SmEXU1

trans-unit.target: ອຸປະກອນທີ່ໃຊ້ງານໄດ້:
trans-unit.note: Header for the list of devices table

trans-unit.target: ປິດ
trans-unit.note: Close button in top navigation bar

trans-unit.id: Please open Firefox, go to Settings and sign in to continue.
trans-unit.source: Please open Firefox, go to Settings and sign in to continue.
trans-unit.target: ກະລຸນາເປີດ Firefox, ໄປທີ່ການຕັ້ງຄ່າ ແລະ ລົງຊື່ເຂົ້າໃຊ້ເພື່ອດຳເນີນການຕໍ.
trans-unit.note: See http://mzl.la/1ISlXnU

trans-unit.target: ສົ່ງ
trans-unit.note: Navigation bar button to Send the current page to a device

trans-unit.target: ສົ່ງແທັບ
trans-unit.note: Title of the dialog that allows you to send a tab to a different device

trans-unit.id: You are not signed in to your Firefox Account.
trans-unit.source: You are not signed in to your Firefox Account.
trans-unit.target: ທ່ານບໍ່ໄດ້ລົງຊື່ເຂົ້າໃຊ້ບັນຊີ Firefox ຂອງທ່ານ.
trans-unit.note: See http://mzl.la/1ISlXnU

trans-unit.id: You don't have any other devices connected to this Firefox Account available to sync.
trans-unit.source: You don't have any other devices connected to this Firefox Account available to sync.
trans-unit.target: ທ່ານບໍ່ມີອຸປະກອນໃດໆທີ່ເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ກັບບັນຊີ Firefox ນີ້ຢູ່ເພື່ອສາມາດໃຊ້ການ Sync ໄດ້.
trans-unit.note: Error message shown in the remote tabs panel

trans-unit.target: ສົ່ງແທັບ
ເພີ່ມ
trans-unit.note: Add button in the share dialog

trans-unit.target: ເພີ່ມບຸກມາກ
trans-unit.note: On/off toggle to select adding this url to your bookmarks

trans-unit.target: ເພີ່ມເຂົ້າໄປໃນລາຍການອ່ານ
trans-unit.note: On/off toggle to select adding this url to your reading list

trans-unit.target: ເບິງຕາມຫລັງ

trans-unit.note: A brief descriptive name for this app on this device, used for Send Tab and Synced Tabs. The first argument is the app name. The second argument is the device name.

trans-unit.target: ລາຍການບຸກມາກ
trans-unit.note: The name of the folder that contains desktop bookmarks in the menu. This should match bookmarks.folder.menu.label on Android.

trans-unit.target: ບຸກມາກ Toolbar
trans-unit.note: The name of the folder that contains desktop bookmarks in the toolbar. This should match bookmarks.folder.toolbar.label on Android.

trans-unit.target: ບຸກມາກໂທລະສັບມືຖື
trans-unit.note: The title of the folder that contains mobile bookmarks. This should match bookmarks.folder.mobile.label on Android.

trans-unit.target: ບໍ່ຈັດລຽງລຳດັບບຸກມາກ
trans-unit.note: The name of the folder that contains unsorted desktop bookmarks. This should match bookmarks.folder.unfiled.label on Android.

trans-unit.target: ບໍ່ໄດ້ຕັ້ງຊື່
trans-unit.note: The default name for bookmark folders without titles. The default name for bookmark nodes without titles.
